00071 // When the dynamic library is loaded via dlopen(), getting a handle
00072 // on this function is the only way to create a Problem object.
00073 
00074 extern "C" Problem* getProblem()
00075 {
00076 // Cerr<<"coucou getProblem"<<finl;
00077   Problem* T=new ProblemTrio;
00078   return T;
00079 }

00099 //! As initialize doesn't have any arguments, they can be passed to the Problem<br>at the time of instantiation.<br>They can include data file name, MPI communicator,..<br>In this implementation (for use outside TRUST), only the name of an<br>underlying Probleme_U needs to be provided.

00101 ProblemTrio::ProblemTrio()
00102 {
00103   my_params=new Init_Params;
00104   (*my_params).problem_name="default_vvvvv";
00105   (*my_params).problem_name="pb";
00106 // my_params.comm=MPI_COMM_WORLD;
00107   (*my_params).is_mpi=0;
00108   pb=NULL;
00109   p=NULL;
00110 }

00113 void ProblemTrio::setDataFile(const string& file)
00114 {
00115   (*my_params).data_file=file;
00116 }
00117 void ProblemTrio::setMPIComm(void* mpicomm)
00118 {
00119 #ifdef MPI_
00120   if (mpicomm)
00121     {
00122       (*my_params).is_mpi=1;
00123       (*my_params).comm=*((MPI_Comm*)(mpicomm));
00124     }
00125 #endif
00126 }
00127 // Precondition: Problem is instantiated, not initialized
00128 // (*my_params) have been filled by constructor.
00129 // Parametre:
00130 // Signification:
00131 // Valeurs par defaut:
00132 // Contraintes:
00133 // Acces:
00134 // 
00135 // Signification:
00136 // Contraintes:
00137 // Exception: WrongContext
00138 // Effets de bord:
00139 // Postcondition:
00140 // Problem initialized.
00141 // Unknown and given fields are initialized at initial time
00142 //
00143 //
00144 //! This method is called once at the beginning, before any other one of<br>the interface Problem.
00145 bool ProblemTrio::initialize()
00146 {
00147   Process::exception_sur_exit=1;
00148   if (((*my_params).problem_name=="default_vvvvv") || ((*my_params).data_file=="default_vvvvv"))
00149     throw WrongArgument("??","Constructor","data","data shoud point to the name of a Probleme_U");
00150 
00151 #ifdef MPI_
00152 // exception if I don't belong to comm !
00153   True_int rank_in_comm=0;
00154   if ((*my_params).is_mpi!=0)
00155     {
00156       if (MPI_Comm_rank((*my_params).comm,&rank_in_comm)!=MPI_SUCCESS)
00157         throw WrongArgument((*my_params).problem_name,"initialize","comm","This process should belong to comm");
00158       if (rank_in_comm==MPI_UNDEFINED)
00159         throw WrongArgument((*my_params).problem_name,"initialize","comm","This process should belong to comm");
00160 
00161       Comm_Group_MPI::set_trio_u_world((*my_params).comm);
00162 
00163     }
00164   Comm_Group_MPI::set_must_mpi_initialize(0); //!< ???
00165 #endif
00166   int argc=2;
00167   char** argv=new char*[argc];
00168   string code="TRUST wrapper";
00169 // Les copies sont necessaires pour se debarrasser des const...
00170   argv[0]=new char[code.length()+1];
00171   strcpy(argv[0],code.c_str());
00172   argv[1]=new char[(*my_params).data_file.length()+1];
00173   strcpy(argv[1],(*my_params).data_file.c_str());
00174 // pour salome
00175   if (p) delete p;
00176   p=NULL;
00177   int res;
00178 // on lance avec ou sans mpi
00179   res=main_TRUST(argc,argv,p,(*my_params).is_mpi);
00180 
00181 
00182   delete [] argv[0];
00183   delete [] argv[1];
00184   delete [] argv;
00185 
00186   Nom nom("ICoCoProblemName"),nom_pb;
00187   if (nom.interprete().objet_existant(nom))
00188     {
00189       nom_pb=ref_cast(Nom,get_obj(nom));
00190       Cout<<finl<<" ICoCoProblemName from data file "<<nom_pb<< finl;
00191     }
00192   else
00193     {
00194       nom_pb="pb";
00195       Cout<<finl<<" ICoCoProblemName not found in data file, we try "<<nom_pb<< finl;
00196     }
00197 
00198   (*my_params).problem_name=nom_pb;
00199   pb=&ref_cast(Probleme_U,get_obj(nom_pb));
00200   if (res || !pb)
00201     throw WrongArgument((*my_params).problem_name,"initialize","problem_name","No problem of that name found in data file");
00202   initialize_pb(*pb);
00203 
00204 // Register signal and signal handler (SIGINT) if user presses ctrl-c during exec
00205   if (!Objet_U::DEACTIVATE_SIGINT_CATCH)
00206     {
00207       Catch_SIGINIT sig;
00208       sig.set_nom_cas_pour_signal(pb->nom_du_cas());
00209       signal(SIGINT, Catch_SIGINIT::signal_callback_handler);
00210     }
00211 
00212 // Print the initialization CPU statistics
00213   if (!Objet_U::disable_TU)
00214     {
00215       statistiques().dump("Statistiques d'initialisation du calcul", 0);
00216       print_statistics_analyse("Statistiques d'initialisation du calcul", 0);
00217     }
00218   statistiques().reset_counters();
00219   statistiques().begin_count(temps_total_execution_counter_);
00220   return true;
00221 }
00222 bool ProblemTrio::initialize_pb(Probleme_U& pb_to_solve)
00223 {
00224   if (pb==NULL)
00225     pb=&pb_to_solve;
00226   pb_to_solve.initialize();
00227   pb_to_solve.postraiter(1);
00228   return true;
00229 }
00230 
00231 // Precondition: initialize, but not yet terminate
00232 // Parametre:
00233 // Signification:
00234 // Valeurs par defaut:
00235 // Contraintes:
00236 // Acces:
00237 // 
00238 // Signification:
00239 // Contraintes:
00240 // Exception: WrongContext
00241 // Effets de bord:
00242 // Postcondition:
00243 // The object is ready to be destroyed.
00244 //
00245 //
00246 //! This method is called once at the end, after any other one.<br>It frees the memory and saves anything that needs to be saved.
00247 void ProblemTrio::terminate()
00248 {
00249   pb->postraiter(1);
00250   pb->terminate();
00251   int mode_append=1;
00252   if (!Objet_U::disable_TU)
00253     {
00254       statistiques().dump("Statistiques Resolution", mode_append);
00255       print_statistics_analyse("Statistiques Resolution", 1);
00256     }
00257   if(p)
00258     {
00259       delete p;
00260       p=0;
00261 // fait dans mon_main maintenant // PE_Groups::finalize();
00262     }
00263 }

00291 {
00292   return pb->presentTime();

00295 // Precondition: initialize, not yet terminate
00296 // Parametre: stop
00297 // Signification: Does the Problem want to stop ?

00309 //! Compute the value the Problem would like for the next time step.<br>This value will not necessarily be used at the call of initTimeStep,<br>but it is a hint.<br>This method may use all the internal state of the Problem.
00310 /** \return double<br>
00311 Signification: The desired time step<br>
00312 Contraintes: */
00313 double ProblemTrio::computeTimeStep(bool& stop) const
00314 {
00315   return pb->computeTimeStep(stop);
00316 }

00319 // Precondition: initialize, not yet terminate, timestep not yet initialized, dt>0
00320 // Parametre: double dt
00321 // Signification: the time interval to allocate
00322 // Valeurs par defaut:
00323 // Contraintes:
00324 // Acces:
00325 // Exception: WrongContext, WrongArgument
00326 // Effets de bord:
00327 // Postcondition:
00328 // Enables the call to several methods for the next time step
00329 //
00330 //
00331 //
00332 //
00333 //! This method allocates and initializes the unknown and given fields<br>for the future time step.<br>The value of the interval is imposed through the parameter dt.<br>In case of error, returns false.
00334 /** \return bool<br>
00335 Signification: true=OK, false=error, not able to tackle this dt<br>
00336 Contraintes: */
00337 bool ProblemTrio::initTimeStep(double dt)
00338 {
00339   return pb->initTimeStep(dt);
00340 }

00343 // Precondition: initTimeStep
00344 // Parametre:
00345 // Signification:
00346 // Valeurs par defaut:
00347 // Contraintes:
00348 // Acces:
00349 // Exception: WrongContext
00350 // Effets de bord:
00351 // Postcondition:
00352 // The unknowns are updated over the next time step.
00353 //
00354 //
00355 //! Calculates the unknown fields for the next time step.<br>The default implementation uses iterations.
00356 /** \return bool<br>
00357 Signification: true=OK, false=unable to find the solution.<br>
00358 Contraintes: */
00359 bool ProblemTrio::solveTimeStep()
00360 {
00361   statistiques().begin_count(timestep_counter_);
00362   if (pb->lsauv())
00363     pb->sauver();
00364   bool res=pb->solveTimeStep();
00365 
00366   return res;
00367 }
00368 
00369 
00370 // Precondition: initTimeStep
00371 // Parametre:
00372 // Signification:
00373 // Valeurs par defaut:
00374 // Contraintes:
00375 // Acces:
00376 // 
00377 // Signification:
00378 // Contraintes:
00379 // Exception: WrongContext
00380 // Effets de bord:
00381 // Postcondition:
00382 // The present time has moved forward.
00383 //
00384 //
00385 //
00386 //
00387 //! Validates the calculated unknown by moving the present time<br>at the end of the time step.<br>This method is allowed to free past values of the unknown and given<br>fields.
00388 void ProblemTrio::validateTimeStep()
00389 {
00390   pb->validateTimeStep();
00391   if(sub_type(Probleme_base,*pb))
00392     {
00393       const Probleme_base& pb_base = ref_cast(Probleme_base,*pb);
00394       const Schema_Temps_base& sch = pb_base.schema_temps();
00395       bool stop_ = sch.stop();
00396       if (!stop_) pb->postraiter(0);
00397     }
00398   else
00399     {
00400 // If *pb is a coupled problem, we may get the last line duplicated in post-processing files.
00401       pb->postraiter(0);
00402     }
00403   statistiques().end_count(timestep_counter_);
00404 }
00405

00415 // ProblemTrio unchanged

00419 Signification: true=stationary, false=not stationary<br>

00421 bool ProblemTrio::isStationary() const

00464 // interface IterativeUnsteadyProblem    //

00468 // Precondition: initTimeStep
00469 // Parametre: bool& converged
00470 // Signification: It is a return value :
00471 // true if the process has converged, false otherwise.
00472 // Valeurs par defaut:
00473 // Contraintes:
00474 // Acces:
00475 // Exception: WrongContext
00476 // Effets de bord:
00477 // Postcondition:
00478 // The unknowns are updated over the next time step.
00479 //
00480 //
00481 //
00482 //
00483 //
00484 //
00485 //
00486 //
00487 //! In the case solveTimeStep uses an iterative process,<br>this method executes a single iteration.<br>It is thus possible to modify the given fields between iterations.<br>converged is set to true if the process has converged, ie if the<br>unknown fields are solution to the problem on the next time step.<br>Otherwise converged is set to false.<br>The return value indicates if the convergence process behaves normally.<br>If false, the ProblemTrio wishes to abort the time step resolution.
00488 /** \return bool<br>
00489 Signification: true=OK, false=unable to converge<br>
00490 Contraintes: */
00491 bool ProblemTrio::iterateTimeStep(bool& converged)
00492 {
00493   return pb->iterateTimeStep(converged);
00494 }

00507 //! This method is used to find the names of input fields understood by the Problem
00508 /** \return vector<string><br>
00509 Signification: list of names usable with getInputFieldTemplate and setInputField<br>
00510 Contraintes: */
00511 vector<string> ProblemTrio::getInputFieldsNames() const
00512 {
00513   vector<string> v;
00514   Noms noms;
00515   pb->getInputFieldsNames(noms);
00516   for (int i=0; i<noms.size(); i++)
00517     v.push_back(noms[i].getChar());
00518   return v;
00519 }

00571 double ProblemTrio::getOutputDoubleValue(const std::string& name) const
00572 {
00573   TrioField f;
00574   try
00575     {
00576       getOutputField(name,f);
00577     }
00578   catch (WrongArgument& err)
00579     {
00580       vector<string> fld = getInputFieldsNames();
00581       if (std::find(fld.begin(), fld.end(), name) == fld.end())
00582         throw err;
00583 
00584       Cerr << "WARNING: trying to call getOutputDoubleValue() of an input field...!!" << finl;
00585       return -1e+38;
00586     }
00587   if (f.nb_values()!=1)
00588     throw WrongArgument((*my_params).problem_name,"getOutputDoubleValue",name,"invalid field size (should be 1)!!");
00589 
00590   return f._field[0];
00591 }
00592 
00593 vector<string> ProblemTrio::getOutputFieldsNames() const
00594 {
00595 
00596 // const Probleme_base& pb_base=ref_cast(Probleme_base,*pb);
00597   Noms my_names;
00598   pb->getOutputFieldsNames(my_names);
00599   vector<string> output_names;
00600   for (int i=0; i<my_names.size(); i++)
00601     output_names.push_back(my_names(i).getChar());
00602   return  output_names;
00603 
00604 }
00605 
00606 ICoCo::ValueType ProblemTrio::getFieldType(const std::string& name) const
00607 {
00608   vector<string> fld = getOutputFieldsNames();
00609   if (std::find(fld.begin(), fld.end(), name) == fld.end())
00610     {
00611       fld = getInputFieldsNames();
00612       if (std::find(fld.begin(), fld.end(), name) == fld.end())
00613         throw WrongArgument((*my_params).problem_name,"getFieldType","name","invalid field name!!");
00614     }
00615 // All fields thus far are Double field in TRUST:
00616   return ICoCo::ValueType::Double;
00617 }

00620 {
00621   Motcle name(name_.c_str());
00622   pb->getOutputField(name,afield);
00623 }

00653 
00654 void ProblemTrio::setInputMEDDoubleField(const std::string& name, const MEDDoubleField& afield)
00655 {
00656 #ifndef NO_MEDFIELD
00657 // bof en attendant mieux
00658   TrioField  triofield;
00659   getInputFieldTemplate(name,triofield);
00660 #ifdef OLD_MEDCOUPLING
00661   const ParaMEDMEM::DataArrayDouble *fieldArr=afield.getField()->getArray();
00662 #else
00663   const MEDCoupling::DataArrayDouble *fieldArr=afield.getMCField()->getArray();
00664 #endif
00665   triofield._field=const_cast<double*> (fieldArr->getConstPointer());
00666 // il faut copier les valeurs
00667   setInputField(name,triofield);
00668   triofield._field=0;
00669 // fieldArr->decrRef();
00670 
00671 // Assigning proper component names
00672   const unsigned int nbcomp = fieldArr->getNumberOfComponents();
00673   std::vector<std::string> compo_names = fieldArr->getInfoOnComponents();
00674 
00675   REF(Field_base) ch = pb->findInputField(Nom(name.c_str()));
00676   assert(nbcomp == (unsigned)ch->nb_comp());
00677   for (unsigned int i = 0; i < nbcomp; i++)
00678     {
00679       Nom compo_name(compo_names[i].c_str());
00680       ch->fixer_nom_compo((int)i, compo_name);
00681     }
00682 #else
00683   throw NotImplemented("No ParaMEDMEM","setInputMEDDoubleField");
00684 #endif
00685 }

00702 {
00703 #ifdef OLD_MEDCOUPLING

00705 #else

00707 #endif

00710 bool ProblemTrio::isMEDCoupling64Bits() const
00711 {
00712 #ifdef OLD_MEDCOUPLING
00713   return false;
00714 #else
00715   return sizeof(mcIdType) == 8;
00716 #endif
00717 }

00721 {

00723   Objet_U& obj=nom.interprete().objet(nom);
00724   return obj;
